email_chain.subject: Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out from Maritime Trade Services to offer a shipment of 5000MT of wheat from Rotterdam to Shanghai on CIF terms.

We have the vessel OCEAN STAR available for this route, with a DWT of 75000 and LOA of 225m. The initial freight quote is USD 45.50 per MT. The laycan is set for 25th to 30th October.

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 43.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 44.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 25th to 30th October, and the loading window is 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 44.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Rotterdam on 25th October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers
